description: Parrot OS is a Linux distribution based on Debian with a focus on security, privacy, and development.
notes:
The Kasm Parrot OS Workspace requires libseccomp => 2.5.3 to run.

This can be checked by running runc --version

If you still want to run Parrot OS but do not have the minimum required libseccomp version, it can be run in an unsecure manner by adding: {"security_opt":["seccomp=unconfined"]} to the Docker Run Config Override (JSON) setting above.

NOTE: This will run the Workspace without the docker seccomp sandbox and will significantly reduce the amount of protection that Kasm Workspaces can provide.


This image includes software that may not function properly unless the Kasm session is executed with elevated privileges.

Please see the following documentation for configuring the image to run as root, utilize sudo, or other custom privileges.

https://kasmweb.com/docs/latest/how_to/running_as_root.html
